column.name: role_type
column.text: 角色类型(1独立2员工3岗位)

statements.statement:
select A.*,B.ROLE_TYPE_NAME role_type_name from t_power_role_info A left join T_POWER_ROLE_TYPE B on A.role_type_id = B.role_type_id where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( A.code like '%${key}%' or A.role_name like '%${key}%' or A.role_desc like '%${key}%' or A.createby_name like '%${key}%' or A.updateby_name like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and A.id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and A.role_id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.code??> and A.code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' </#if>
<#if query.categoryId??> and A.role_type_id = ${query.categoryId} </#if>
<#if query.type??> and A.role_type = ${query.type} </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.role_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.description??> and A.role_desc = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.description)}' </#if>
<#if query.createUserId??> and A.createby = ${query.createUserId} </#if>
<#if query.createUserName??> and A.createby_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createUserName)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(A.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.updateUserId??> and A.updateby = ${query.updateUserId} </#if>
<#if query.updateUserName??> and A.updateby_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateUserName)}' </#if>
<#-- 岗位下的角色 --> <#if query.positionId??> and A.role_id in (select role_id from T_POWER_DUTIES_ROLE where duties_id=${query.positionId}) </#if>
<#-- 用户的角色 --> <#if query.userId??> and role_id in (select role_id from T_POWER_DUTIES_ROLE where duties_id in (select duties_id from t_user_duties where user_id =${query.userId})) </#if>
</#if>
select A.*,B.ROLE_TYPE_NAME role_type_name from t_power_role_info A left join T_POWER_ROLE_TYPE B on A.role_type_id = B.role_type_id where 1=1
